Summary: Seen lots of times, finally got a camera so my family dont think i am going crazy. Right out my kitchen window.
divs: Sighting DetailsSitting eatting dinner looking out my kitchen window over the San Francisco Bay sevral airports suround the Bay S.F., Oakland , San Jose, and Haward. iwatch Planes take off and land everyday. The bright light coming over the horison from Half Moon Bay mountains. The light hovered thier for 30 minutes . Then reduced in size and started floating to the left very slowly then disapeared. When i first saw it i thought it was a plane comming from Hawwii. The next day i seen another one but it floated closer to where i was and i was able to show my son and it was huge i sent the footage and i have a lot more doing some crazy things. The objets seem to disapear into thin air after a while.
